name: part_000
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei 1st Solo Live ＂STELLAR into the GALAXY＂ Supported By Bushiroad [LtqzI9y5yII]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Waiting screen for Hoshimachi Suisei 1st Solo Live 'STELLAR into the GALAXY'.
Music video-style playback of "Stellar Stellar" on the waiting screen.
Introduction of flower stands sent by fans.

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english: Please wait a while until the performance starts.

subtitles.original: 愛されたい気も曇ないのに
subtitles.english: Even though my desire to be loved isn't clouded

subtitles.original: 愛される温もりだけは知っていた
subtitles.english: I only knew the warmth of being loved

subtitles.original: 生まれてきたその瞬間から
subtitles.english: From the moment I was born

subtitles.original: 誰かの手求めて生きてきたんだ
subtitles.english: I've lived seeking someone's hand

subtitles.original: ああ　伸ばした手だけ崩れ落ちた
subtitles.english: Ah, only the hand I reached out crumbled away

subtitles.original: そんな夜のようなこの思いが
subtitles.english: This feeling, like that kind of night

subtitles.original: 胸にあるんだ　僕も未完成なんだ
subtitles.english: Is in my chest; I too am incomplete

subtitles.original: 終わらない夜には　独りきりの朝には
subtitles.english: In the never-ending night, in the lonely morning

subtitles.original: 隣で笑うように　涙が零れないように
subtitles.english: So that I can laugh by your side, so that tears don't spill

subtitles.original: 孤独に輝いた　独りぼっちの星が
subtitles.english: A star shining in solitude, all alone

subtitles.original: ここにいるよと叫んで歌になった
subtitles.english: Cried out "I'm here" and became a song

subtitles.original: 誰かがそれを綺麗と言った
subtitles.english: Someone called it beautiful

subtitles.original: わけもなく泣きたくなるような
subtitles.english: Like wanting to cry for no reason

subtitles.original: 虚しさと寂しさだけを打ち寄せて
subtitles.english: Just the emptiness and loneliness wash over me

subtitles.original: ああ　火をつけてさ　温め合うんだ
subtitles.english: Ah, light a fire and let's warm each other

subtitles.original: もう二度と凍えてしまわないように
subtitles.english: So that we never freeze again

subtitles.original: ねえ　正解とか　間違いとか
subtitles.english: Hey, whether it's right or wrong

subtitles.original: 今は何もわからないけれど
subtitles.english: I don't know anything right now

subtitles.original: 一つだけ確かなのは　私がいるってことだけ
subtitles.english: But the only certain thing is that I am here

subtitles.original: 近付いた分だけ離れていく夢さえ
subtitles.english: Even the dreams that drift away the closer I get

subtitles.original: 今ならその迷い事　笑える気がするから
subtitles.english: I feel like I can laugh at those hesitations now

subtitles.original: 孤独に輝いた　点と点を合わせて
subtitles.english: Connecting the dots that shone in solitude

subtitles.original: 受注販売グッズ
subtitles.english: Order-to-order merchandise

subtitles.original: 独りじゃないと叫んで歌になった
subtitles.english: Cried out "I'm not alone" and became a song

subtitles.original: 誰かがそれを「彗星」と言った
subtitles.english: Someone called it a "comet"

subtitles.original: あなたの頭上に今も降りかかる
subtitles.english: Still falling over your head now

subtitles.original: 悲しみ溶かす光になりたい
subtitles.english: I want to become the light that melts the sadness

subtitles.original: 胸の痛みも一緒に抱えていくから　教えて
subtitles.english: I'll carry the pain in your chest together with you, so tell me

subtitles.original: Flower Stand 紹介
subtitles.english: Flower Stand Introduction

subtitles.original: 終わらない夜には　独りきりの朝には
subtitles.english: In the never-ending night, in the lonely morning

subtitles.original: 隣で笑うように　涙が零れないように
subtitles.english: So that I can laugh by your side, so that tears don't spill

subtitles.original: 孤独に輝いた　独りぼっちの星が
subtitles.english: A star shining in solitude, all alone

subtitles.original: ここにいるよと叫んで歌になった
subtitles.english: Cried out "I'm here" and became a song

subtitles.original: いつか誰かの夜を照らすように
subtitles.english: So that one day it shines on someone's night

subtitles.original: 照らせるように
subtitles.english: So that it can shine
